item.title: bson keys must be strings or symbols
item.description: While setting up a new Rails development environment I ran into the error bson keys must be strings or symbols. After some googling I found the following method to fix it: /gems/bson-1.2.0/lib/bson/bson_c.rb:24:in `serialize': keys must be strings or symbols (TypeError) rvm gemset empty bundle install /fixed
